title: About Me
text:
About Me
Hello! My name is Shriya Chinthak and I am a current masters student at Georgetown University obtaining a M.S. in Data Science and Analytics. I recently graduated magna cum laude from the Honors College of Rutgers University - New Brunswick with a B.S. in Computer Science, double minoring in Data Science and Statistics.



During my time at Rutgers University, I was a member and president my senior year of the Society of Asian Scientists and Engineers. Additionally, I was a member of the Voorhees Choir and a research assistant under Dr. Tawfiq Ammari’s Computational Social Science lab working on NLP research surrounding online conversations on Covid-19 and Long Covid. In my free time, I enjoy live music, art museums, and trying new foods.
